title: Bamboo Leaf
summaries: The Bamboo Leaf is a pet-summoning item that spawns a Baby Red Panda to follow the player around. When the player is far enough away or in midair, the Baby Red Panda will fly towards the player while surfing on a bamboo leaf in order to catch up to them. The Bamboo Leaf can be purchased from the Traveling Merchant for 1 PC.
